title: How To Spend Time in a Lovely Room
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Waaah, your room is so lovely, Shizuku. You have so many books.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’ve always liked reading books. When you’ve read something for a while, it’s like you entered the world of the story.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, it must be so nice to read in a charming room like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, that poster is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, that’s a poster of my favorite actress. I really like the movies she’s in, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari is a fan of them too! Like that one about the linguistics professor and a girl from downtown.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Really!? I love that one!!! Seeing her grow up slowly, accompanied with the beautiful soundtrack....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I have a DVD of the movie here, so if you don’t mind, would you watch it with me after this? I’d love to watch it together with someone that shares my opinion!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course♪ Mari hasn’t seen it in a while, so Mari is looking forward to it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
